promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young legendary reptile water-type pokemon wearing dark gemstones. It can be found in lake-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or reptile. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gemdraqua, a a chibi young legendary reptile water-type pokemon. It can be found in lake-like environments It has the following abilities: Strongarm Impact. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "reptile", "water" or "Gemdraqua". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, reptile-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, aurora background
generatedDescription: Found in serene ponds, this petite legendary creature, Gemdraqua, uses its mighty Strongarm Impact to play by hurling pebbles in waves.
